pr_title: PLANNER-1955: Add JPA AttributeConverters for Score entities

rsynek

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change

timeline.author: rsynek

timeline.body: The class is identical to `AbstractScoreHibernateTypeTest` with only a single difference: the `AbstractTestJpaEntity`. I wonder if the code can be reused - e.g. by just providing different abstract entity classes.
timeline.bodyText: The class is identical to AbstractScoreHibernateTypeTest with only a single difference: the AbstractTestJpaEntity. I wonder if the code can be reused - e.g. by just providing different abstract entity classes.
timeline.bodyHTML: The class is identical to AbstractScoreHibernateTypeTest with only a single difference: the AbstractTestJpaEntity. I wonder if the code can be reused - e.g. by just providing different abstract entity classes.
timeline.author: rsynek

replies.bodyText: Removed the code duplication by abstracting the test entity and methods in AbstractScoreJpaTest (naming and approach is open for discussion). @ge0ffrey thoughts?
replies.author: cuijulian

timeline.message: Add JPA AttributeConverters for Score entities

timeline.body:
This should not be in the "impl" package, but the "api" instead.
So `org.optaplanner.persistence.jpa.api.score.buildin.bendable`.

@triceo I 'd even argue we want to drop the ".persistence" part in that url.
So `org.optaplanner.jpa.api.score.buildin.bendable`.
timeline.bodyText:

replies.bodyText:
@cuijulian For this PR, just put the scores in org.optaplanner.persistence.jpa.api.score.buildin...
The .persistence discussion is out of scope for this PR.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

replies.bodyText:
Will this also apply to the *HibernateType classes?
EDIT: After some thought, I think not. HibernateTypes belong to impl.
replies.author: cuijulian

replies.bodyText:
If these classes are becoming a part of our API, let's also make sure we maintain backward compatibility by adding revapi config file like we have for optaplanner-core:
https://github.com/kiegroup/optaplanner/blob/master/optaplanner-core/src/build/revapi-config.json
replies.author: rsynek

timeline.body: Let's not add anything for Double scores, as they're getting deprecated (for removal in 8.0). CC @triceo
